mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT(CHATNO, NICK, CONTENTS) VALUES(CHAT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nick}, #{contents})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(CHATNO), 0) AS MAXNO FROM CHAT
SELECT CHATNO, NICK, CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(WRITEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WRITEDATE FROM CHAT WHERE CHATNO > #{lastChatNo} ORDER BY CHATNO ASC
